comment.author: 75814411@N05
comment._content: palais de la chasse et de la pêche

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
We founds some references that indicate this may well be the Palace of Forestry, Hunting, Fishing and Gathering of Wild Crops, so have added that to the caption. 

(Info came from a contemporaneous publication in our library: The Paris Exposition of 1900 : a vivid descriptive view and elaborate scenic presentation of the site, plan and exhibits ... / by James P. Boyd, 1900.)

Thanks, Guadet!
Deb Wythe
Brooklyn Museum digital Lab
